portfolio.title: Society Project
portfolio.description: This is an all purpose social network practice project, maintain by a group of highly motivated young developers. Communication is leaded with Agile Methodology with Daily Standups and Sprint of tasks. Tech stack The client app is a NextJS TypeScript project, using MUI React components. The server application is a Java application with Spring Boot framework, Postgre database, app is dockerized.
